items.name: APS Mailbox
items.description: Mailbox for the Federated Postal Service of ARK

items.name: Mail
items.description: Mail from ARK Postal Service

items.name: Hazard Suit Boots
items.description: Boots made from a unique combination of materials that protect the wearer from environmental contaminants.

items.name: Hazard Suit Gloves
items.description: Gloves made from a unique combination of materials that protect the wearer from environmental contaminants.

items.name: Hazard Suit Hat
items.description: A helmet made from a unique combination of materials that protect the wearer from environmental contaminants.

items.name: Hazard Suit Pants
items.description: Pants made from a unique combination of materials that protect the wearer from environmental contaminants.

items.name: Hazard Suit Shirt
items.description: A shirt made from a unique combination of materials that protect the wearer from environmental contaminants.

items.name: Ghillie Boots
items.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool.  Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures.  Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

items.name: Ghillie Gauntlets
items.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool.  Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures.  Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

items.name: Ghillie Mask
items.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool.  Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures.  Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

items.name: Ghillie Leggings
items.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool.  Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures.  Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

items.name: Ghillie Chestpiece
items.description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool.  Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures.  Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

items.name: Iron Boots
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Iron Gauntlets
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Iron Helmet
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Iron Leggings
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Iron Chestpiece
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Mosasaurus Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Mosasaurus look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Parasaur Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Parasaur look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Quetzal Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Quetzal look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Raptor Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Raptor look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Stegosaurus Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Stegosaurus look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Triceratops Bionic Costume
items.description: This costume can be used to make your Triceratops look like it was manufactured...

items.name: Beer Jar
items.description: Mmmmm.

items.name: Bug Repellant
items.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs, bats, and spiders. Just don't attack them or get too close, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

items.name: Canteen
items.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

items.name: Canteen
items.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

items.name: Narcotic
items.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

items.name: Fresh Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

items.name: Fresh Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

items.name: Fresh Prime Meat
items.description:
Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly.
Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.name: Fresh Prime Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly. Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.name: Stimulant
items.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

items.name: Pliers
items.description: Use on a Smithy-crafted item in need of repairing and you can repair it on the go within any inventory, at a higher cost of resources.

items.name: Birthday Cake
items.description: Place this Cake on a table and blow out its candles to make a wish (then eat it). Or you can put it in a Cooking Pot for...

items.name: Metal Catwalk
items.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together.  Made from metal plates.

items.name: Metal Ceiling
items.description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Metal Hatchframe
items.description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

items.name: Giant Metal Hatchframe
items.description: This giant metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

items.name: Metal Door
items.description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Metal Fence Foundation
items.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

items.name: Metal Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

items.name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
items.description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Behemoth Gate
items.description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

items.name: Metal Ladder
items.description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures.  Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

items.name: Metal Pillar
items.description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build under.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

items.name: Metal Railing
items.description: A metal-plated concrete railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

items.name: Metal Ramp
items.description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels.  Can also be used to make an angled roof.

items.name: Metal Sign
items.description: A small metal sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

items.name: Metal Billboard
items.description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

items.name: Metal Wall Sign
items.description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

items.name: Metal Spike Wall
items.description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them.  Larger creatures take more damage.

items.name: Metal Staircase
items.description: A metal spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

items.name: Metal Trapdoor
items.description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

items.name: Giant Metal Trapdoor
items.description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Metal Wall
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

items.name: Metal Windowframe
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Metal Window
items.description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

items.name: Smithy
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

items.name: Simple Bed
items.description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe.

items.name: Beer Barrel
items.description: Ferments tasty brew from Thatch, Water, and Berries.

items.name: Cannon
items.description: A powerful, heavy weapon of war, capable of demolishing heavily reinforced structures.

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

items.name: Tek Replicator
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create  Tek items, and many other items. Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.

items.name: Metal Water Reservoir
items.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

items.name: Scope Attachment
items.description:
The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports:  Pistols, Machined Shotgun, Machined Sniper and Longneck Rifle.</>

items.name: Silencer Attachment
items.description:
The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sounds.
Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports:  Longneck Rifle, Pistols, Assault Rifle.</>

items.name: Birthday Candle
items.description: The critical ingredient for a Birthday Party!

items.name: Cementing Paste
items.description: This thick, waterproof paste could be used as mortar, or to thicken another substance.

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: An powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

items.name: Iron
items.description: A lump of unrefined metal ore, mined from rocks usually found high on mountains, or in caves. Can be refined in a Forge.

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: Created by refining metal ore in a Forge.

items.name: Crude Oil
items.description: A thick blob of unrefined oil.  Can be refined with hide to make gasoline.

items.name: Sparkpowder
items.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle or Chemistry Table.

items.name: Pheromone Dart
items.description: A dart full of refined Ammonite chemicals, inject on a target to enrage nearby wild creatures. For use in a Longneck rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

items.name: Flame Arrow
items.description: Lights the target on fire, and can also light oil slicks.

items.name: Stone Arrow
items.description: A basic arrow with a flint arrowhead.  If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

items.name: Tranq Arrow
items.description: Less deadly than other arrows, but rapidly increases the victim's Torpidity.

items.name: Cannon Ball
items.description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

items.name: Iron Hatchet
items.description: A sharp metal hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

items.name: Iron Pick
items.description: A large metal pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and meat from bodies.

items.name: Squid Oil
items.description: A thick blob of oily ink.  Can be refined into fuel.

items.name: Biscuit
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

items.name: Biscuit Batter
items.description: Refined syrup made from sorghum.

items.name: Baked Bread Loaf
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

items.name: Broth
items.description: Broth that can be consumed on its own or mixed with other ingredients.

items.name: Cake Batter
items.description: Batter for cakes made from flour.

items.name: Cigarette
items.description: When you're having one of those days! Drastically reduces hunger but increses oxygen consumption.  Effects last 30 minutes.

items.name: Cooked Bacon
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Cooked Fish Fillet
items.description: A very nutritious fillet of fish.

items.name: Cooked Meat Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Lasts longer than cooked meat.
Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: Salted Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Lasts longer than regular jerky.
Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: Salted Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Lasts longer than regular jerky.
Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: Cooked Poultry
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Prime Meat Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat jerky, and lasts longer than cooked prime meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Salted Prime Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal salted jerky.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Salted Prime Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than aged jerky.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Cooked Spare Ribs
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Cookies
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

items.name: Corn Starch
items.description: Corn starch is a popular food ingredient used in thickening sauces or soups.

items.name: Cured Bacon
items.description: This bacon still needs to be put on an open fire before eating.

items.name: Wheat Beer
items.description: Beer muscles!!  Consume it to deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen.  Effects last 15 minutes.

items.name: Braggot Mead
items.description: Alcoholic mead made from honey and malt.

items.name: Fermented Wine
items.description: Wine Courage!!  Consume it to deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen.  Effects last 15 minutes.

items.name: Bonemeal Fertilizer
items.description: Bone meal is a mixture of finely and coarsely ground animal bones and slaughter-house waste products. It is mainly used as an organic fertilizer for plants.

items.name: Fresh Fat
items.description: Eating fresh fat has slight health benefits when you're in a bind.  This was harvested using a machete.

items.name: Fresh Bacon
items.description: This bacon still needs to be cured with salt in a smoker.

items.name: Fresh Fish Fillet
items.description: A very nutritious fillet of fish.  Needs to be cooked to avoid illness.

items.name: Fresh Poultry
items.description: Don't eat raw! Poultry that can be used for special recipes or normal nourishment.

items.name: Fresh Spare Ribs
items.description:
Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut of meat was harvested using a machete.
Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.name: Gravy
items.description: Broth and cornstarch mixed to make gravy.

items.name: Baked Honey Loaf
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

items.name: Honey
items.description: Sweet food made by bees foraging nectar from flowers.  Bees must be kept in an apiary to produce honey.

items.name: Icing
items.description: What can this be used for? Cake!

items.name: Cake
items.description: Reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Chicken and Rice
items.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Fillet and Bread
items.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Pizza
items.description: A filling meal that reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Prime Salad
items.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Salad
items.description: A meal that is so filling, it reduces your hunger for a short period.

items.name: Pancakes
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.

items.name: Pancake Batter
items.description: Refined syrup made from sorghum.

items.name: Jam of Amarberry
items.description: A jam of amarberry that has been preserved with sugar.

items.name: Jam of Azulberry
items.description: A jam of azulberry that has been preserved with sugar.

items.name: Jam of Mejoberry
items.description: A jam of mejoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

items.name: Jam of Tintoberry
items.description: A jam of tintoberry that has been preserved with sugar.

items.name: Seawater Container
items.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water to be boiled for salt

items.name: Canteen
items.description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

items.name: Amarberry Juice
items.description: Amarberry juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Azulberry Juice
items.description: Azulberry juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Juice
items.description: Juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Mejoberry Juice
items.description: Mejoberry juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Stimbull Juice
items.description: Stimbull juice made on the fruit press.  The best drink for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Tintoberry Juice
items.description: Tintoberry juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your energy reserves!

items.name: Tomato Juice
items.description: Tomato juice made on the fruit press.  Great for restoring your vitality!

items.name: Cup of Coffee
items.description: This fresh cup of coffee refreshes your body like an oasis.  Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of food consumption.  Effects last 15 minutes.

items.name: Cup of Tea
items.description: This fresh cup of tea refreshes your body like an oasis.  Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of water consumption.  Effects last 15 minutes.

items.name: Cane Sugar
items.description: Refined sugar made from a sugarcane plant and boiling over a cauldron.

items.name: Sorghum Syrup
items.description: Refined syrup made from sorghum.

items.name: Tomato Sauce
items.description: Sauce that can be put on a pizza.

items.name: Cooked Rice
items.description: Cooked rice that can be combined with other consumables.

items.name: Cashew
items.description: This nut grows from a cashew tree.  Can be used to make milk.

items.name: Lettuce
items.description: Great for adding fiber to your diet!

items.name: Fresh Rice
items.description: A cereal grain that provides nutrition on its own but best served with other items.  Will need to be dried and cooked to be eaten.

items.name: Ground Cashew
items.description: Ground cashew can be used to make cashew milk.

items.name: Ground Cashew
items.description: Ground cashew can be used to make cashew milk.

items.name: Ground Soybean
items.description: Ground soybean can be used to make soybean milk.

items.name: Fresh Spinach
items.description: Great for adding fiber to your diet!

items.name: Tomato
items.description: This fruit grows from a tomato plant.  Useful for special recipes!

items.name: Cookie Dough
items.description: Fresh cookie dough made from flour on the baking station.

items.name: Pizza Dough
items.description: Fresh pizza dough made from flour on the baking station.

items.name: Flame Arrow
items.description: Lights the target on fire, and can also light oil slicks.

items.name: Dinghy
items.description: A small boat that is faster than a traditional raft.  Structures cannot be built on the dinghy.

items.name: Adobe Ceiling
items.description: A stable traditional adobe ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Adobe Door
items.description: A stable adobe door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Adobe Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy clay.

items.name: Adobe Doorframe
items.description: A adobe wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Adobe Windowframe
items.description: An adobe wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Adobe Wall
items.description: An adobe wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

items.name: Advanced Workbench
items.description: Similar to the smithy but allows you to craft things at a reduced material cost.

items.name: Alchemy Table
items.description: An advanced method of converting resources into new substances. Must be crafted in advanced workbench.

items.name: Wooden Arrow Sign
items.description: A simple wooden sign with an arrow for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

items.name: Bakers Oven
items.description: Perfect for baking delicious edibles!

items.name: Fermenting Barrel
items.description: Combine malt with various items to make fermented beverages.

items.name: Barrel of Gunpowder
items.description: A very tempermental primitive explosive.  Has a slight chance of misfiring.

items.name: Storage Barrel
items.description: A small barrel to store goods in.

items.name: Simple Bed
items.description: A little more fancy than your starter bed.  provides the same functionality.

items.name: Big Bonfire
items.description: The biggest and safest fire you can make.  Requires a form of wood, crude oil, or angler gel as a fuel source.

items.name: Big Campfire
items.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.  Increased heat and light radius! Must use a form of wood as a fuel source.

items.name: Big Fence - Opening
items.description: Used for a long opening in the big wood fence tier.  Snappable!

items.name: Big Fence - Post
items.description: Used as a post section in the big wood fence tier.  Snappable!

items.name: Big Fence - Section
items.description: Used as a section in the big wood fence tier.  Snappable!

items.name: Brazier
items.description: Increased heating and light radius!

items.name: Brick Dinosaur Gate
items.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Brick Dinosaur Gateway
items.description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up dinosaurs.

items.name: Brick Wall
items.description: A brick-and-mortar styled wall that provides the most protection.

items.name: Brick Doorframe
items.description: A traditional brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Brick Windowframe
items.description: A traditional brick wall with a hole for a window.

items.name: Sloped Brick Wall Left
items.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection.  Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Sloped Brick Wall Right
items.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that provides protection.  Used in conjunction with the roof

items.name: Wooden Cabinet
items.description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.

items.name: Covered Wooden Cabinet
items.description: A wooden cabinet that's able to store a limited amount of items.

items.name: Candle
items.description: Perfect for occasions when you need subtle lighting.

items.name: Cauldron
items.description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire.  Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

items.name: Ceiling Lamp
items.description: This snappable hanging torch will attach to ceilings.  This torch only uses oil and sparkpowder.

items.name: Cement Mixer
items.description: Before making cement structures, the cement must be mixed.

items.name: Sloped Brick Roof
items.description: An inclined brick roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

items.name: Well Rope
items.description: A chain to attach to a well for fetching water.

items.name: Brick Ceiling
items.description: A stable traditional brick ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Brick Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from traditional brick.

items.name: Brick Pillar
items.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build on.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

items.name: Brick Ramp
items.description: An inclined brick floor for travelling up or down levels.  Can also be used to make an angled roof.

items.name: Construction Table
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create tools.

items.name: Cooking Station
items.description: Used to convert raw resources into bakeable items!

items.name: Deadfall Trap
items.description: Kills small creatures so they may be harvested.

items.name: Wood Post Fence
items.description: Use this fence as a decoration or guardrail.

items.name: Fish Trap
items.description: Immobilizes small fish to harvest for meat.

items.name: Fruit Press
items.description: Used to convert berries into juice.  This juice may be combined with other resources or drank on its own for its nutritional value.

items.name: Lumber Bench
items.description: A simple and stylish wooden bench for group sitting.

items.name: Lumber Chair
items.description: A simple wooden chair for solo sitting.

items.name: Lumber Table
items.description: A simple lunber table with a variety of uses.

items.name: Table Lantern
items.description: An oil lantern used to place on a modular table night-time light!

items.name: Lumber Glass Ceiling
items.description: A stable glass ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Door
items.description: A reinforced glass door that provides entance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Grindstone
items.description: A grindstone is a round sharpening stone used for grinding or sharpening ferrous tools.

items.name: Simple Hammock
items.description: A hanging hammock that acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe.

items.name: Handmill
items.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

items.name: Industrial Cooker
items.description: Burns coal to cook large quantities of food quickly.  Put various ingredients in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

items.name: Industrial Grill
items.description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light.  Must use coal as a fuel source.

items.name: Lumber Ceiling
items.description: A stable lumber ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Lumber Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy lumber.

items.name: Lumber Dinosaur Gate
items.description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Lumber Dinosaur Gateway
items.description: A large lumber and stone gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Sloped Glass Roof
items.description: An inclined glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Left
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Glass Wall Right
items.description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Window
items.description: Reinforced glass window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

items.name: Lumber Pillar
items.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build on.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

items.name: Lumber Ramp
items.description: A reinforced inclined lumber floor for travelling up or down levels.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Roof
items.description: An inclined lumber roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

items.name: Wooden Stairs (One Level)
items.description: Wooden stairs.  Go to the next level in style!

items.name: Lumber Wall
items.description: A sturdy lumber wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

items.name: Lumber Doorframe
items.description: A lumber wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Lumber Windowframe
items.description: A lumber wall with a hole for a window.

items.name: Left-Sloped Lumber Wall
items.description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Right-Sloped Lumber Wall
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Lumber Station
items.description: A station to convert wood logs to lumber. Lumber is needed for items requiring additional cutting and shaping.

items.name: Market Stall
items.description: This market stall can travel with you.  You may place trading crates that can removed and replaced.

items.name: Sink
items.description: This metal sink allows access to the water in an irrigation network.  Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

items.name: Miners Box
items.description: Bulk storage for stone, metal, flint, and ingots.

items.name: Modular Table
items.description: Place items on this sturdy table (M&P, Lantern).

items.name: Oil Tank
items.description: A large machine that stores large amounts of oil.

items.name: Pontoon Bridge
items.description: A primitive floating bridge that can be placed in water.

items.name: Preserving Campfire
items.description: A primitive way of preserving meat and drying crops.  Must use sparkpowder or a form of oil as a fuel source.

items.name: Meat Preserving Shed
items.description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria.  Keeps perishables from spoiling for a longer time.

items.name: Modern Grill
items.description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light.  Must use crude oil as a fuel source.

items.name: Industrial Forge
items.description: Refines resources in bulk. Powered by coal.

items.name: Smokehouse
items.description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria.  Keeps perishables from spoiling for a longer time.

items.name: Spinning Mule
items.description: A machine used to spin fiber and cotton into various items

items.name: Steel Handrail
items.description: A sturdy steel handrail for decorative purposes.

items.name: Steel Pillar
items.description: This steel-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

items.name: Big Stone Fence
items.description: A big brick-and-mortar fence.

items.name: Small Stone Fence
items.description: A small brick-and-mortar fence.

items.name: Steel Safebox
items.description: A steel box to store valuables in.

items.name: Steel Locker
items.description: A steel locker to store valuables in.  Offers more protection than the smaller safe.

items.name: Firewood Holder
items.description: Store bulk amounts of firewood and convert fresh firewood to dry firewood.

items.name: Modern Storage Shelf
items.description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

items.name: Modern Hanging Shelf
items.description: Store various items

items.name: Modern Storage Shelf (Fiber)
items.description: Store bulk amounts of any item.

items.name: Weapon Rack
items.description: Store your weapons and tools!

items.name: Wood Storage Shed
items.description: Store bulk amounts of wood and thatch.

items.name: Tanning Rack
items.description: Use salt and hide to make leather!

items.name: Teepee
items.description: Like a bed, this will allow your tribe a universal spawn point.  But unlike a bed, no foundation required.

items.name: Trading Crate (Bread)
items.description: A small box to trade bread in.  Can only be placed on market stall.

items.name: Trading Crate (Eggs)
items.description: A small box to trade eggs in.  Can only be placed on market stall.

items.name: Trading Crate (Fruits Veggies)
items.description: A small box to trade fruits and veggies in. Can only be placed on market stall.

items.name: Trading Crate
items.description: A small box to trade goods in. Can only be placed on market stall.

items.name: Lantern
items.description: An oil lantern used to place on a market stall for night-time vending!

items.name: Tudor Bar
items.description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

items.name: Tudor Bar (L Shaped)
items.description: A wooden bar to enjoy drinks with friends!

items.name: Steel Water Tower
items.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Cannot be filled by other containers.

items.name: Water Well
items.description: Stores large amount of rain water for later use. Cannot be attached to irrigation systems.

items.name: Well Bucket
items.description: This bucket is used like a tap to gain access to a water well.

items.name: Windmill
items.description: Mill your custom grains.

items.name: Wood Handrail
items.description: A sturdy lumber handrail for decorative purposes.

items.name: Yurt
items.description: A temporary tent to shelter that acts as a foundation.

items.name: Beeswax
items.description: Natural wax produced by honey bees.  A very effective binding agent with many uses.

items.name: Brick
items.description: Soft clay that has been heated in a forge to make a hard brick.

items.name: Carbon
items.description: A lump of unrefined carbon, mined from rocks usually found high on mountains, or in caves. Can be refined in a Forge.

items.name: Trap Bait
items.description: Lure for the deadfall trap.

items.name: Cashew Milk
items.description: Milk made from ground cashew and boiled water. Prepared in the cauldron.

items.name: Fresh Cement
items.description: Fresh cement that cen be formed into and used to build larger structures.

items.name: Clay
items.description: Clay that has been formed from grinding claystone and limestone on a handmill.

items.name: Claystone
items.description: Rocks composed of silt and clay-sized particles.

items.name: Coal
items.description: A lump of unrefined coal, mined from rocks usually found high on mountains, or in caves. Can be refined in a Forge.

items.name: Bread Dough
items.description: Fresh dough made from flour on the baking station.

items.name: Dried Barley
items.description: Barley thats been dried for the purpose of making malt

items.name: Dry Firewood
items.description: Wood specifically meant to burn in long lasting fires!

items.name: Drone Bee
items.description: The drone bee lives to mate with the queen to produce worker bees for the apiary

items.name: Fabric
items.description: A sheet of fabric made on a spinning mule

items.name: Feathers
items.description: Can be used to make better arrows and other luxury items.

items.name: Fish Bait
items.description: Lure for the fishing trap.

items.name: Sack of Flour
items.description: Refined flour made from dried wheat.  Must be processed in a handmill.

items.name: Sack of Flour
items.description: Refined flour made from dried wheat.  Must be processed in a handmill.

items.name: Fresh Firewood
items.description: If this firewood is left to dry, it will have a longer burning time.

items.name: Glass
items.description: Glass that has been heated in a forge to make a clear surface.

items.name: Grape Juice
items.description: Grape juice pressed on the fruit press.  Can be used to make wine.

items.name: Liquid Latex
items.description: Liquid lates used for rubber.  Harvested from a ficus elastica

items.name: Leather
items.description: A thick piece of skin, hacked from a dead animal then cured on a tanning rack.

items.name: Limestone
items.description: A specialized rock that contains a high concentration of calcium or magnesium.

items.name: Lumber
items.description: Timber that is flat, elongated, and rectangular mainly used in construction.

items.name: Cup of Malt
items.description: Made from dried barley and boiling water. Used for alcoholic beverages.

items.name: Organic Oil
items.description: Oil processed from animal fat or plant seeds.

items.name: Organic Oil
items.description: Fat made from heating animal fat.  Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

items.name: Organic Oil
items.description: Fat made from grinding plant seed in the handmill.  Less dense than oil harvested from the sea.

items.name: Queen Bee
items.description: The queen bee lives to produce worker bees for the apiary

items.name: Rubber
items.description: Rubber made from liquid latex

items.name: Salt
items.description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.

items.name: Salt
items.description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.

items.name: Salt
items.description: Refined salt made from crystal and a grain wheel.

items.name: Soymilk
items.description: Milk made from ground soybean and boiled water. Prepared in the cauldron.

items.name: Sparkpowder
items.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle or Chemistry Table.

items.name: Steel Ingot
items.description: Created by refining iron ore and carbon in a Forge.

items.name: Fresh Sugar Juice Bucket
items.description: Sugar juice pressed on the sugar press. Must be processed with cauldron to make sugar!

items.name: Tofu
items.description: Well, it can be eaten.

items.name: Worker Bee
items.description: A worker bee produces honey and is the offspring of a queen and drone.

items.name: Natural Yeast
items.description: Made from dough at a baking station.  Used for baking various goods.

items.name: Sloped Brick Roof
items.description: An inclined brick roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

items.name: Brick Doorframe
items.description: A brick wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Brick Windowframe
items.description: A brick wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Brick Wall
items.description: A brick-and-mortar styled wall that provides the most protection.

items.name: Sloped Brick Wall Left
items.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Sloped Brick Wall Right
items.description: A sturdy brick sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Lumber Door
items.description: A lumber door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Lumber Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy lumber.

items.name: Lumber Glass Doorframe
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Lumber Glass Windowframe
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Lumber Glass Wall
items.description: A lumber and glass wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

items.name: Sloped Glass Lumber Wall Left
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Sloped Glass Lumber Wall Right
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Lumber Window
items.description: A lumber glass window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Roof
items.description: An inclined lumber roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

items.name: Lumber Doorframe
items.description: A lumber wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Lumber Windowframe
items.description: A lumber wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Lumber Wall
items.description: A lumber wall made from processed wood.  Offers more protection than standard wood.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Wall Left
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Sloped Lumber Wall Right
items.description: A sturdy lumber sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

items.name: Barley Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own barley crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Cashew Tree
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own cashew tree.  Can only be planed in large tree plot.

items.name: Coffee Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own coffee crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Grape Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own grape crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Lettuce Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own lettuce crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Rice Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own rice crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Sorghum Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own barley crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Soybean Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own soybean crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Spinach Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own barley crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Sugarcane Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own sugarcane crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Camellia (Tea) Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own camellia crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Tobacco Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own tobacco crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Tomato Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own tomato crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Wheat Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own wheat crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Fresh Barley
items.description: Harvested from a barley plant, it can be used to make alcoholic beverages.

items.name: Base Veggie
items.description: Eat it to gain nourishment!

items.name: Fresh Coffee Fruit
items.description: This magical fruit grows along the coast.  May be processed further to make coffee.  Eat for a slight stamina boost!

items.name: Dried Tea Bags
items.description: Tea thats been dried.  This crop can be harvested for a delicious drink, or combines with other ingredients to make recipes.

items.name: Dried Tobacco
items.description: May be rolled with a note.  When you're having on of those days.

items.name: Dried Wheat
items.description: Harvested from a wheat plant and dried on a preserving hut, it can be used to make flour.

items.name: Grapes
items.description: This fruit can be processed in a barrel over time to make wine.

items.name: Fresh Sorghum
items.description: Harvested from a sorghum plant.  Used in a variety of recipes.

items.name: Soybean
items.description: Harvested from a soybean plant. Can be used in a variety of recipes.

items.name: Fresh Sugar Plant
items.description: Harvested from a sugarcane plant, this plant can be used with baking recipes.

items.name: Fresh Tea Leaves
items.description: This item needs to be dried before it can be used for a drink.

items.name: Fresh Tobacco
items.description: This needs to be dried before using.  When you're having on of those days.

items.name: Fresh Wheat
items.description: Harvested from a wheat plant, it can be used to make flour.

items.name: Dried Rice
items.description: Rice that has dried - allowing it to be cooked in a cauldron or industrial cooking pot.

items.name: Flaming Arrow
items.description: A flaming arrow meant to strike fear in the hearts of your foes!

items.name: Obsidian Arrow
items.description: Most deadly arrow to be crafted.  Made from pure obsidian.

items.name: Feathered Stone Arrow
items.description: An advanced arrow with a flint arrowhead and feathers.  If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

items.name: Viking Axe
items.description: A mighty battle axe weilded by the toughest of foes.

items.name: BattleAxe
items.description: A mighty axe used for serious battles!

items.name: LongBow
items.description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerers.  Requires arrows to fire.

items.name: Metal Hammer
items.description: A strong metal hammer primarily used for taming dinosaurs.

items.name: Metal Machete
items.description: A sharp metal machete used for harvesting specialized consumables.

items.name: Obsidian Pickaxe
items.description: Used to collect specialized stone resources from rocks.

items.name: Obsidian Spear
items.description: A dangerous melee weapon made out of obsidian that can also be thrown.  Has a chance to break when used.

items.name: Pitchfork
items.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown.  Has a chance to break when used. Slightly more damage than a spear.

items.name: Flintlock Pistol
items.description: This early aged pistol trades accuracy for flexibility.

items.name: Musket
items.description: This simple single-shot musket is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

items.name: Recurve Bow
items.description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerers.  Requires arrows to fire.

items.name: Sharpened Sword
items.description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.

items.name: Stone Hunting Knife
items.description: Useful for gaining small amounts of hide.

items.name: Wooden Club
items.description: A strong wooden club for taming low level dinosaurs and collecting resources.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown.  Has a chance to break when used.

items.name: Sticky Bomb
items.description: Throw it to create a sticky substance which can be lit! Very combustible!
